pullRequest.title: License Checks for IDP
pullRequest.bodyText:
Idp related functionality should only be available for enterprise
licenses.

commit.message:
License Checks for IDP

Idp related functionality should only be available for enterprise
licenses.

nodes.bodyText:
MISSING is here twice.
The other option, rather than explicitly listing non-enterprise modes is to use randomValueOtherThanMany like:
License.OperationMode mode = randomValueOtherThanMany( m -> m == License.OperationMode.ENTERPRISE || m == License.OperationMode.TRIAL, () -> randomFrom(License.OperationMode.values()) )

commit.message: Repeat after me: I will never skip running precommit
